member.name: DirectX.Direct3DCreate9
member.summary: Create an IDirect3D9 object and return an interface to it.
member.param: The value of this parameter should be D3D_SDK_VERSION. See Remarks.
member.returns: If successful, this function returns a pointer to an interface; otherwise, a NULL pointer is returned.

member.name: DirectX.Direct3DCreate9Ex
member.summary: Creates an object and returns an interface to it.
member.param: The value of this parameter should be D3D_SDK_VERSION. See Remarks.
Address of a pointer to an interface, representing the created IDirect3D9Ex object. If the function fails, NULL is inserted here.

item.description: D3DERR_NOTAVAILABLE if Direct3DEx features are not supported (no WDDM driver is installed) or if the SDKVersion does not match the version of the DLL.
D3DERR_OUTOFMEMORY if out-of-memory conditions are detected when creating the enumerator object.
S_OK if the creation of the enumerator object is successful.
